title: Ah, Snap! Firefox Is Finally Providing Deb Package for Debian and Ubuntu Users
description:
I come bearing some good news! Mozilla has introduced a new .deb package for Firefox that is meant for Ubuntu, Debian, and other Debian-based distros.

The post Ah, Snap! Firefox Is Finally Providing Deb Package for Debian and Ubuntu Users appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Lightweight Distro BunsenLabs Linux Boron Is Here Based on Debian Bookworm
description:
The biggest change of the BunsenLabs Linux Boron release is the new base derived from the latest Debian GNU/Linux 12 “Bookworm” operating system series. Of course, this means that the distribution is now powered by the long-term supported Linux 6.1 LTS kernel series, which will receive updates until December 2026.

The post Lightweight Distro BunsenLabs Linux Boron Is Here Based on Debian Bookworm appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Ubuntu 23.04 “Lunar Lobster” Reached End of Life, Upgrade to Ubuntu 23.10 Now
description:
As of January 25th, 2024, Canonical will no longer release software and security updates to Ubuntu 23.04 systems, which means that, in time, your installations will become vulnerable to all sorts of threats and attacks.

The post Ubuntu 23.04 “Lunar Lobster” Reached End of Life, Upgrade to Ubuntu 23.10 Now appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Valve Releases Proton 8.0-5 With HDR Support for Multiple Video Games
description:
Valve released today Proton 8.0-5 as the latest version of this open-source compatibility tool for Steam Play based on Wine and additional components that enable Linux users to play Windows games.

The post Valve Releases Proton 8.0-5 With HDR Support for Multiple Video Games appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Calibre 7.4 Open-Source Ebook Manager Adds Support for Supernote A6X2 Nomad
description:
Calibre 7.4 is here to introduce support for the Supernote A6X2 Nomad device, an elegant electronic notebook for taking notes, annotating, and reading. The Supernote A6X2 Nomad offers a distraction-free reading experience and a paper-like tablet writing experience.

The post Calibre 7.4 Open-Source Ebook Manager Adds Support for Supernote A6X2 Nomad appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Install Firefox as a DEB App on Ubuntu 22.04: The Proper Way
description:
This guide shows you how to install Firefox as a classical DEB application on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS from Mozilla’s official repository.

The post Install Firefox as a DEB App on Ubuntu 22.04: The Proper Way appeared first on Linux Today.

title: How to Install Jellyfin Media Server on Ubuntu 22.04
description:
Jellyfin is free, open-source media server software, enabling users to host and manage personal media libraries, stream content across devices, and provide access to others. In this guide, we’ll show you how to install the Jellyfin media server on Ubuntu 22.04. You will install Jellyfin with Apache as a reverse proxy and secure Jellyfin with […]

The post How to Install Jellyfin Media Server on Ubuntu 22.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
